about_the_game:
From the universe of CAT WITH GUN - Now you can raise your very own cat lobster !

From the moment you hatch your cat lobster, it will have a unique personality with likes and dislikes. You can earn coins in minigames, where you walk your cat lobster, or play a game of chance by spinning the Lucky Wheel. You can spend coins to decorate your lobster's tank, and even buy a cute accessory for your cat lobster. Your pet will get hungry, tired, bored or dirty in real time, so it's up to you to give food, put the cat lobster to bed, wash and amuse the cat lobster.

If you raise your cat lobster well in this way and upgrade the tank, it will grow to adulthood and moult its shell. Each lobster's adult shell color is determined by how well you raise it, as well as it's unique predisposition. You may release an adult lobster to the sea to have new adventures, but you can also keep an adult cat lobster as a pet.

CAT LOBSTER simulator contains three minigames, an achievement book to record your cat lobster's milestones, tank customisation toggles, a food menu, and a virtual shop. Let's learn facts about cat lobsters and have a nice day together.

Song is by EMAMOUSE ! Trailer editing by ZAPTF2 ! Voice acting by RAGTAGSTUFF !

name: Cat Lobster Simulator
short_description: Beautiful simple and cute game where you raise a Cat Lobster. Feed, play, wash and rest your cat lobster in real time. Earn gold coins in minigames, and customise the lobster's tank! If you raise your cat lobster well, it will moult its shell and evolve into an adult cat lobster.
